Introduction

Kang Haerin is a South Korean singer-songwriter and dancer under ADOR and HYBE Labels. She is best known a member of the girl group NewJeans.

Born and raised in Seoul, South Korea, Haerin passed her audition with HYBE in 2020 and became a trainee of Source Music and ADOR. She's Known for her cat-like visuals and charms, Haerin also actively participates in solo brand endorsements and pictorials. She is also credited as one of the songwriters for NewJeans' hit songs "NewJeans" and "Super Shy."

On July 22, 2022, Haerin officially debuted as a member of NewJeans with their self-titled debut mini album "NewJeans".
